item.description:
Hi everyone:

 

how do you feel about this cruise? Eagle/Osprey? I think by April it should be warm enough.

this is going to cost $35.00 per person .I'm sorry the price has gone up, they don't offer group discounts for the eagle osprey cruises.

I have not booked this cruise yet , I need an idea of how many people would be interested please let me know by March 15 if you are interested.you may bring 1 guest. No children under the age of 18 please.

If you are  still interested in going even at the higher price, then I will need your checks by

March 16th. please make them out to me Candace Bryan and I will reserve with my credit card.

 

Candy

group.name: The Eastern CT Widows and Widowers Meetup Group

item.name: Eagle/Osprey Cruise
